name: Lti
disp: System clock lost
reason: The system clock is in either holdover mode or freerun mode
resolvent: Check whether the system clock configuration is correct or the system timing reference source is normal.

name: Lto
disp: Output clock lost
reason: External timing reference signals are suppressed.
resolvent: Check whether the external timing output configuration is correct or the external timing reference signals are normal.

name: CsLos
disp: Clock source los
reason: The clock at the corresponding port is lost.
resolvent: Check whether the fiber or the cable is connected properly or not.

name: CsLof
disp: Clock source lof
reason: External input timing source has LOF alarm.
resolvent: When the external input timing source LOF alarm is cleared, CsLof alarm is cleared also.

name: CsAis
disp: Clock source ais
reason: External input timing source  has AIS alarms.
resolvent: When the external input timing source AIS alarm is cleared, CsAis alarm is cleared also.

name: SSMBM
disp: Ssm byte mismatch
reason: Loss of SSM byte.
resolvent: Check the timing configuration at the local NE and the network.

name: CsBad
disp: Clock source bad
reason: The frequency offset of the reference clock is too big.
resolvent: Check whether the timing reference source is degraded or the local NE internal crystal oscillator is degraded.

name: PowerFail
disp: Power failure
reason: 1. Power is off. 2. Power is not supplied. 3. Power module is damaged or missing. 4.Power module is offline.
resolvent: 1. Turn on the power. 2. Supply power correctly. 3. Replace the power module or plug in a power module.

name: FanFail
disp: Fan module failure
reason: 1. Fan module is not installed. 2. Fan module is abnormal.
resolvent: 1. Install fan modules. 2. Replace the abnormal fan module.

name: HighTemperature
disp: Temperature threshold crossed
reason: 1. The equipment working temperature range is not configured properly. 2. Fan module is abnormal which causes the system over-heat. 3. Environment temperature is too high or low.
resolvent: 1. Adjust the temperature threshold. 2. Check fan modules. 3. Check environment temperature.

name: LowTemperature
disp: Temperature threshold crossed
reason: 1. The equipment working temperature range is not configured properly. 2. Fan module is abnormal which causes the system over-heat. 3. Environment temperature is too high or low.
resolvent: 1. Adjust the temperature threshold. 2. Check fan modules. 3. Check environment temperature.

name: CardOffline
disp: Card offline
reason: The physical card doesn't exist.
resolvent: Check whether the physical card matches the logical card or not; plug in the correct type card or change the configuration.

name: CardMismatch
disp: Logical card type and physical card type mismatch
reason: Logical card type does not match physical card type.
resolvent: Check whether the physical card match the configured logical card, plug in the right type card  or change the logical card configuration.

name: CardFailure
disp: Failure has been detected on one or more major chips of the card
reason: The card malfunctions
resolvent: Check or replace the card

name: Upgrading
disp: File system is upgrading
reason: Current file system is upgrading
resolvent: Check whether the course of the upgrading is normal

name: ConfigurationLost
disp: No configuration data in NE
reason: 1.The NE's previous configuration data is not saved in the database. 2. The database is incompatible after the software is upgraded, which leads to the failure of data restoration. 3. The card's flash is damaged
resolvent: 1. Issue saving command after the configuration is changed. 2. Clear the old data before the software upgrade if there is data mismatch. 3. Replace the card

name: MemInsuffi
disp: System memory insufficient
reason: Memory remained is not  sufficient
resolvent: 1. Check whether current application is abnormal. 2. Expand the memory.

name: DiskInsuffi
disp: System flash insufficient
reason: Flash memory remained is not sufficient
resolvent: 1. Check whether the flash has been damaged. 2. Expand the memory of flash.

name: FileCorrupt
disp: File system corrupt
reason: Current file system corrupt
resolvent: 1. Inqury the damaged file list using the command of  QueryBadFileList and delete the damaged file. 2. Format the file systyem if the damaged file system can not be repaired.

name: LoadFailure
disp: Card load failure
reason: 1.NE or software do not support this card 2.Card is not plugged in slot compactly 3.There are not corresponding file need to be loaded 4.Card was damaged
resolvent: 1.Check if software support this card,if not ,please upgrade 2.Check if card was plugged in slot compactly 3.Check if there are corresponding files 4.Replace the card

name: LspBdi
disp: Lsp Bdi
reason: There are  defects received by the opposite device.
resolvent: Check whether there are  any defects received at the opposite end device

name: LspLoc
disp: Loss of Connectivity Verification
reason: There is no pre-configured CV or FFD packet received during 3 consecutive packet periods
resolvent: Check line and lsp work status

name: LspMismatch
disp: Lsp TTSI Mismatch
reason: The connectivity by CV or FFD detection to the specified source in T-MPLS trails is broken
resolvent: Check line and lsp work status

name: LspMismerge
disp: Lsp TTSI Mismerge
reason: Connectivity by CV or FFD detection to sources other than the specified one in T-MPLS trails is present
resolvent: Check line and lsp work status

name: LspExcess
disp: Lsp Excess
reason: Excessive CV or FFD packets have been received during 3 consecutive packet periods
resolvent: Check line and lsp work status

name: LspFdi
disp: Lsp forward defect indicator
reason: There are defects occurred in the upstream section or node
resolvent: Check whether there are any defects occurred in the upstream section or node

name: TransceiverOffline
disp: Transceiver offline
reason: Optical module doesn't exist
resolvent: 1. Optical module has not been plugged in.2. Optical module is damaged

name: TransceiverMismatch
disp: Transceiver type mismatch
reason: Inserted a wrong type optical module
resolvent: Replace the optical module

name: TxOff
disp: Transceiver shut down
reason: Optical module has not been plugged in or  is damaged.
resolvent: Plug in optical module or change another optical module

name: RxTooHigh
disp: the receiving power detected is over the High Threshold
reason: 1. The power is too high, and the probable cause could be the fiber fault or the dirty fiber connector, etc. which cause optical power abnormal. 2.Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber connection, and use an optical power meter to test whether the fiber is good or not. 2. Replace the optical module. 3. Replace the card.

name: RxTooLow
disp: the receiving power detected is below the Low Threshold
reason: 1. The power is too low, and the probable cause could be the fiber fault or the dirty fiber connector, etc. which cause optical power abnormal. 2.Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber connection, and use an optical power meter to test whether the fiber is good or not. 2. Replace the optical module. 3. Replace the card.

name: LaserMismatch
disp: Laser type mismatch
reason: Inserted a wrong type Laser
resolvent: Replace the Laser

name: LaserShutdown
disp: Laser shutdown
reason: LPT triggered
resolvent: Check LPT status

name: ExtEvt
disp: External IO Alarm
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt1
disp: External IO Alarm 1
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt2
disp: External IO Alarm 2
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt3
disp: External IO Alarm 3
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt4
disp: External IO Alarm 4
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt5
disp: External IO Alarm 5
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt6
disp: External IO Alarm 6
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt7
disp: External IO Alarm 7
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt8
disp: External IO Alarm 8
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt9
disp: External IO Alarm 9
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt10
disp: External IO Alarm 10
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt11
disp: External IO Alarm 11
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt12
disp: External IO Alarm 12
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt13
disp: External IO Alarm 13
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt14
disp: External IO Alarm 14
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt15
disp: External IO Alarm 15
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: ExtEvt16
disp: External IO Alarm 16
reason: N/A
resolvent: N/A

name: LinkFail
disp: Link failure
reason: Two ends' working mode mismatch.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber or cable connection. 2. Re-configure the card and the switch port mode according to the instruction manual.

name: ELos
disp: Loss of signal - Ethernet optical  port
reason: 1. Fiber is disconnected or connector is connected incorrectly. 2. Laser in the peer-station is shut down. 3. Fault occurs in the local receiving card or the peer-station's transmission card.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the fiber is correctly connected and use fiber power meter to check whether fiber is in good condition. 2. Check the transmission module of the peer-station to see whether it is shut down. 3. Replace the card.

name: PLos
disp: Loss of signal - Electric Port
reason: 1. The cable is misconnected or disconnected. 2. No output from the switch. 3. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the cable connection. 2. Check the switch to see whether its output is normal. 3. Replace the card.

name: PAis
disp: Alarm indication signal - Electric Port
reason: The switch has fault.
resolvent: Check the switch.

name: LCVExc
disp: Excessive CV on PPI port
reason: Code violation of iuput signal
resolvent: 1. Check cable connection.  2. Check whether iuput signal type is correct.

name: POOF
disp: Out of frame on PPI
reason: Out of frame on PPI.
resolvent: 1. Check cable connection.  2. Check whether iuput signal type is correct.

name: RAI
disp: Remote Alarm Indication
reason: Remote malfunction.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber connection and use a fiber power meter to check whether the fiber is in good condition or not. 2. Replace the card.

name: CASMFL
disp: CASMFL Channel Associated Signaling Multiframe LOSS
reason: Channel Associated Signaling Multiframe LOSS.
resolvent: 1. Check cable connection. 2. Check whether iuput signal type is correct. 3.Check the signal frame type.

name: RMFAI
disp: Remote Multiframe Alarm Indication
reason: Remote Multiframe Alarm Indication.
resolvent: 1. Check cable connection. 2. Check whether iuput signal type is correct. 3.Check the signal frame type.

name: Los
disp: Loss of signal
reason: 1. The fiber is cut or the connector is misconnected. 2. The opposite NE's laser is shut down. 3. The receiving side card or the transmission side card in the opposite NE malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber connection, and use an optical power meter to test whether the fiber is good or not. 2. Check whether the laser transmission module in the opposite NE is shut down. 3. Replace the card.

name: Lof
disp: Loss of frame
reason: 1. Fiber connection error or abnormal optical power caused by too high attenuation. 2. The receiving side card or the transmission side card inside the opposite NE malfunctions. 3. Fault in clock card.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber connection, and test with an Optical Power Meter. 2. Replace the card. 3. Check the clock card.

name: OOF
disp: Out of frame
reason: 1. Fiber connection has fault or the optical power is abnormal due to the high attenuation.  2. The receiving side card or the transmission side card malfunctions.  3. System clock card has fault.
resolvent: 1. Check fiber connection and use a fiber power meter to check the fiber connection.  2. Replace the card.  3. Check whether system clock card is working normally.

name: TF
disp: Transmission failure
reason: 1. The transmitter is shut down.  2. The transmitter reaches its life time.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the transmitter is shut down or ALS function is working.  2. Check the transmitter status, try to replace the card.

name: TD
disp: Transmission degraded
reason: The transmitter is degraded.
resolvent: Check the transmitter status, replace the card.

name: RsAis
disp: Alarm indication signal - RS
reason: 1. The receiving side card or the transmission side card inside the opposite NE malfunctions. 2. LOS alarm is received
resolvent: 1. Replace the card. 2. If there is los alarm

name: RsTim
disp: Trace identifier mismatch - RS
reason: J0 byte mismatch.
resolvent: Compare the received J0 bytes sent from the opposite NE with the expected J0 bytes configured at the local NE.

name: RsExc
disp: Excessive bit error rate - RS
reason: 1. RS error rate exceeds threshold. 2. Fiber connection has fault or signal error rate exceeds threshold because of high attenuation. 3. Receiving card or its opposite NE's transmission card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber connection and use a fiber power meter to check the fiber. 2. Replace the card.

name: RsDeg
disp: Bit error rate degraded - RS
reason: 1. RS bit error rate exceeds signal degrade threshold.  2. The fiber connection has fault or the signal bit error rate exceeds the threshold due to the high attenuation.  3. The receiving side card or the transmission side card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber connection and use a fiber power meter to check whether fiber is good or not. 2. Replace the card.

name: MsAis
disp: Alarm indication Signal - MS
reason: 1. MSAIS Alarm is inserted in the opposite NE. 2. The receiving side card or the transmission side card inside the opposite NE malfunctions. 3. LOS alarm is received in the upstream REG node.
resolvent: 1. Check whether MSAIS signal is inserted in the opposite NE's card. 2. Replace the card. 3. If the upstream NE is a REG type, check whether there is any LOS received by the REG.

name: MsRdi
disp: Remote defect indication - MS
reason: 1. The opposite NE received the LOS, LOF or MSAIS alarm. 2. MSRDI alarm is inserted at the opposite NE.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the opposite NE received LOS, LOF or MSAIS alarms. 2. Check whether MSRDI alarm is inserted in the opposite NE.

name: MsRei
disp: Remote error indication - MS
reason: B2 bit error is detected by the opposite NE.
resolvent: Check the fiber connection and the signal between the local NE and the opposite NE to see whether there is any error or not, and check whether this opposite NE detected B2 bit error.

name: MsExc
disp: Excessive bit error rate - MS
reason: B2 BER at the receiving side crossed the threshold. The probable cause could be the fiber fault or the dirty fiber connector, which leads to optical power abnormal.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber with an optical power meter, and make sure it is connected properly. 2. Clean the fiber connector.

name: MsDeg
disp: Bit error rate degraded - MS
reason: B2 BER at the receiving side crossed degrading threshold. The probable cause could be the fiber fault or the dirty fiber connector, which leads to optical power abnormal.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber with an optical power meter, and make sure it is connected properly. 2. Clean the fiber connector.

name: AuAis
disp: Alarm indication signal - AU
reason: 1. Upstream service fault or there is no service added. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the service is added properly. 2. Check whether the upstream NE has LOS, LOF or MSAIS alarms. 3. Replace the card.

name: AuLop
disp: Loss of pointer - AU
reason: 1. The receiving side card or the transmission side card inside the opposite NE malfunctions. 2. System clock card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Replace with another card to locate the fault. 2. Check whether the system clock card works properly or not.

name: AuPjExc
disp: Excessive pointer adjustment - AU
reason: Clock mismatch.
resolvent: Check whether both ends trace the same source or not.

name: HpRdi
disp: Remote defect indication - HP
reason: The opposite end received service affected alarm sent from the local end.
resolvent: Check whether the opposite end received any alarms, and locate the fault.

name: HpPlm
disp: Signal label mismatch - HP
reason: 1. C2 byte from the incoming service doesn't match the payload type. 2. C2 byte actually received doesn't match the expected byte at the receiving side.
resolvent: Check whether the C2 byte at the transmission end matches the expected C2 byte at the receiving end.

name: HpUneq
disp: HP unequipped
reason: 1. The service is not provisioned on the path from the opposite NE. 2. C2 byte from the incoming service is 0. 3. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the upstream NE's configuration. 2. Replace with another card to locate the fault.

name: HpAis
disp: Alarm indication signal - HP
reason: 1. Upstream service end malfunctions.  2. C2 byte is 0xff.  3. The card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check upstream NE's alarms.  2. Replace the card to locate fault.

name: HpTim
disp: Trace identifier mismatch - HP
reason: 1. The J1 byte sent by the path transmission side does not match the expected J1 byte at the receiving side. 2. Critical alarms at the upstream NE cause J1 byte error.
resolvent: 1. Check path configuration, connection status and J1 byte setting. 2. Check whether the upstream NE has other critical alarms.

name: HpExc
disp: Excessive bit error rate - HP
reason: 1. The B3 BER at the receiving end exceeds the threshold. The probable cause could be the fiber fault or the dirty fiber connector, etc. which cause optical power abnormal. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the card at the receiving side detects B1, B2 PM data, and the related alarms. Check the fiber connection and clean the connector if B1, B2 bit errors are found. 2. To locate the fault, replace the card if only if B3 bit error is found.

name: HpDeg
disp: Bit error rate degraded - HP
reason: 1. The B3 BER at the receiving end exceeds the threshold. The probable cause could be the fiber fault or the dirty fiber connector, etc. which cause optical power abnormal. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the card at the receiving side detects B1, B2 PM data, and the related alarms. Check the fiber connection and clean the connector if B1, B2 bit errors are found. 2. To locate the fault, replace the card if only if B3 bit error is found.

name: TuLom
disp: Loss of multi-frame - TU
reason: 1. Upstream service has fault or no service has been added. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the service configuration. 2. Check the optical interface card to see whether it has any alarms. 3. Replace the card.

name: TuAis
disp: Alarm indication signal - TU
reason: 1. Upstream service has fault or no service has been added. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the service configuration.  2. Check the optical interface card to see whether it has any alarms. 3. Replace the card.

name: TuLop
disp: Loss of pointer - TU
reason: 1. Upstream service has fault or no service has been added. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the service configuration.  2. Check the optical interface card to see whether it has any alarms. 3. Replace the card.

name: TuPjExc
disp: Excessive pointer adjustment - TU
reason: Clock mismatch.
resolvent: Check whether both ends trace the same source or not.

name: LpRdi
disp: Remote defect indication - LP
reason: The opposite end received service related alarm sent from the local end.
resolvent: Check whether the opposite end received any alarm indication and locate the fault.

name: LpPlm
disp: Payload label mismatch -LP
reason: 1. The received V5 byte's signal label doesn't match the expected value. 2. Found bit errors in the received signal. 3. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the received V5 byte's signal label match the expected value. 2. Check whether there is any bit error in the received signal. 3. Replace the card.

name: LpRfi
disp: Remote failure indication - LP
reason: The service received at the opposite end has fault, and the fault lasting time exceeds the maximum protection time of the transmission system, the device will be out of service.
resolvent: Check whether the opposite end has received any alarms, and locate the fault.

name: LpRei
disp: Remote error indication - LP
reason: Bip2 bit error is detected by the opposite NE
resolvent: Check the fiber connection and the signal between the local NE and the opposite NE to see whether there is any error or not, and check whether this opposite NE detected Bip2 bit error.

name: LpUneq
disp: LP unequipped
reason: 1. V5 byte's signal label sent from the service transmission end is 0. 2. Found bit error in the received signal. 3. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether V5 byte's signal label sent from the service transmission end is set to 0. 2. Check whether there is any bit error in the received signal. 3. Replace the card.

name: LpAis
disp: Alarm indication signal - LP
reason: 1. V5 byte's signal label sent from the service transmission end is 7. 2. Found bit error in the received signal. 3. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether V5 byte's signal label sent from the service transmission end is set to 7. 2. Check whether the bit error is in the received signal. 3. Replace the card.

name: LpTim
disp: Trace indication mismatch -LP
reason: 1. J2 byte received doesn't match the expected value. 2. Service configuration is incorrect. 3. Bit error exists in the received signal. 4. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the received J2 byte matches the expected value at the receiving end. 2. Check whether the service configuration is correct or not. 3. Check whether there is any bit error in the received signal or not. 4. Replace the card.

name: LpExc
disp: Excessive bit error rate - LP
reason: 1. B2 BER in the received signal exceeds the threshold. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber interface card to see whether there is any bit error. 2. Check whether the clock card is working normally. 3. Replace the card.

name: LpDeg
disp: Bit error rate degraded - LP
reason: 1. B2 BER in the received signal exceeds the signal degrade threshold. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the optical interface card to see if there is any bit error. 2. Check if the clock card is working properly. 3. Replace the card.

name: Vc3TuAis
disp: AU alarm indication of  VC3
reason: 1. Upstream service fault or there is no service added. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the service configuration is correct. 2. Check where there is any alarm on the optical card. 3. Try replace the card.

name: Vc3TuLop
disp: TUP  indication of  VC3
reason: 1. Upstream service fault or there is no service added. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the service configuration is correct. 2. Check where there is any alarm on the optical card. 3. Try replace the card.

name: Vc3Ais
disp: High order path alarm indication  of VC3
reason: 1. Upstream service fault. 2. C2 byte of the service handled is 0xff. 3. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the alarm of upsteam NE. 2. Try locate the malfunction by replacing  the card.

name: Vc3Plm
disp: High order path service identifier disadapted of VC3
reason: 1. C2 byte of the service handled does't match the type of service. 2. The C2 byte sent by the service transmission side is not corresponding to the expected valued set up by the receiving card.
resolvent: 1. Check  whether  there is matching between the C2 byte sent by the service transmission side  and  the expected value set up by the receiving card.

name: Vc3Uneq
disp: HO path of VC3 unequipped
reason: 1. Transmittion service to the channel which is not configured by the station. 2. C2 byte of access service is zero. 3. Card  malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the alarm of upsteam NE. 2. Try locate the malfunction by replacing  the card.

name: Vc3Tim
disp: HO path track mismatch of VC3
reason: 1. The J1 byte sent by the path transmission side does not match the expected J1 byte at the receiving side. 2. Critical alarms at the upstream NE cause J1 byte error.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the service configuration, conection and the J1 byte configuration are correct. 2. Check whether the upstream NE has other critical alarms.

name: Vc3Rdi
disp: HOP Remote Defect Indication of VC3
reason: The opposite end received service affected alarm sent from the local end.
resolvent: 1. Whether the oppsite side receive the server malfunction alarm ,then locate the malfunction.

name: Vc3BerExc
disp: HOP  Errored Ratio Threshold crossing
reason: 1. The B3 BER at the receiving end exceeds the threshold. The probable cause could be the fiber fault or the dirty fiber connector, etc. which cause optical power abnormal. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the card at the receiving side detects B1, B2 PM data, and the related alarms. Check the fiber connection and clean the connector if B1, B2 bit errors are found. 2. To locate the fault, replace the card if only if B3 bit error is found.

name: Vc3BerDeg
disp: HOP  Errored Ratio  is degraded
reason: 1. The B3 BER at the receiving end exceeds the threshold. The probable cause could be the fiber fault or the dirty fiber connector, etc. which cause optical power abnormal. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the card at the receiving side detects B1, B2 PM data, and the related alarms. Check the fiber connection and clean the connector if B1, B2 bit errors are found. 2. To locate the fault, replace the card if only if B3 bit error is found.

name: K1K2M
disp: K1, K2 mismatch
reason: 1. Normally, this alarm is reported along with the switching of the linear MS and is cleared immediately. 2. All other cases are abnormal.
resolvent: MS Switch failed if it can not be cleared Proposal: 1. Check MS configuration. 2. Stop MS and then restart it. 3. Clear the errors and check again whether it is caused by the bit errors in the optical channel.

name: K2M
disp: K2 mismatch
reason: 1. Normally, this alarm appears when 1:n linear MS has been started and disappears immediately. 2. All other cases are abnormal.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the configuration is correct or the protection mode at the two ends of the NEs matches or not. 2. Check whether there is any bit error in the optical channel.

name: MSPLinearPsbf
disp: Linear MS protection switch byte failure
reason: Wrong K byte has been received in protection channel of Linear MS protection.
resolvent: Check fiber connection.

name: MspSqNotReady
disp: MS-SPRING ring squelch table is not ready
reason: 1. It is not a closed ring.  2. Configuration is wrong. 3. Fiber connection is wrong. 4. MS protection topology generation has not been completed yet.
resolvent: It takes time to generate the MS-SPRING protection topology. But if the alarm lasts more than 5 minutes, optical connection and MS protection configuration should be checked.

name: PortLpbk
disp: Port looped back
reason: The port is in loopback state.
resolvent: Check the current configuration, make sure the loopback is right.

name: GfpLcs
disp: Client signal failure
reason: Loss of client signal of peer station: no signal is transmitted in peer physical link.
resolvent: Check physical link of peer station.

name: GfpLccs
disp: Client signal synchronization failure
reason: Loss of client signal of peer station: incorrect work mode setting which leads to incorrect link.
resolvent: Check work mode setting.

name: GfpLfd
disp: GFP synchronization failure
reason: GFP frame cannot be correctly found out.
resolvent: Check whether SDH link works properly.

name: GfpUpm
disp: UPI which GFP recive is not matching with the expected value
reason: The service of gfp do not match.
resolvent: Check the configuration of gfp.

name: GfpSsf
disp: GFP Server Signal Fail
reason: Server failure
resolvent: check net and check configuration

name: noKnownPacketRx
disp: Receive unknown packages
reason: when the packet flow with unsupported protocol, control and/or address has been continuously received for more than 1 second without any recogenized packet received
resolvent: check configuration

name: Lcd
disp: Loss of cell delineation
reason: Error bits, LOS or LOF received
resolvent: 1. Check the cable connection. 2. Replace the card

name: Ocd
disp: Out of cell delineation
reason: Received error bits
resolvent: 1. Check the cable connection. 2. Replace the card

name: VcAisE2eIgr
disp: Ingress end to end Virtual channel Alarm indication signal
reason: 1. Upstream service fault or no service is added. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the service is added properly or not. 2. Check whether the upstream NE has Los, Lof or MsAis alarms. 3. Replace the card.

name: VcAisE2eEgr
disp: Egress end to end Virtual channel Alarm indication signal
reason: 1. Upstream service fault or no service is added. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the service is added properly or not. 2. Check whether the upstream NE has Los, Lof or MsAis alarms. 3. Replace the card.

name: VcAisSegIgr
disp: Ingress segment Virtual channel Alarm indication signal
reason: 1. Upstream service fault or no service is added. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the service is added properly or not. 2. Check whether the upstream NE has Los, Lof or MsAis alarms. 3. Replace the card.

name: VcAisSegEgr
disp: Egress segment Virtual channel Alarm indication signal
reason: 1. Upstream service fault or no service is added. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the service is added properly or not. 2. Check whether the upstream NE has Los, Lof or MsAis alarms. 3. Replace the card.

name: VcRdiE2eIgr

disp: PW loss of connection
reason: The fiber is cut or the connector is misconnected
resolvent: 1. Check the connection. 2. Replace the card

name: pwAtmBufQueueOverload
disp: Buffer queue overload of PW
reason: The received ATM cell is not enough at the PE-BOUND
resolvent: 1.Check Whether the clock is locked. 2. Replace the card.

name: CepMissingPkt
disp: While playing out a sequence of packets, at least one packet was determined to be missing based on a  gap in the CEP sequence number
reason: The CE-BOUND can not re-order the packet
resolvent: 1.Check whether the clock status is locked 2.Replace the card.

name: CepOoRngDropped
disp: At least one Packet arrived outside the range of the jitter buffer
reason: The CE-BOUND can not re-order the packet
resolvent: 1.Check whether the clock status is locked 2.Replace the card.

name: CepJtrBufUnder
disp: The jitter buffer underflowed because not enough packets arriving as packets were being played out
reason: Not enough packed arrived at the CE-BOUND
resolvent: 1.Check whether the clock status is locked 2.Replace the card.

name: CepPktMalformed
disp: Any error related to unexpected packet format (except bad header stack) or unexpcted length
reason: The packet is destroyed
resolvent: 1.Check whether the clock status is locked  2.Check the fiber power 3.Replace the card.

name: CepAis
disp: Remote CEP packetizer has detected AIS on its incoming SONET stream
reason: 1.No signal is transmitted in peer physical link. 2.The fiber is cut or the connector is misconnected.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber connection, and use an optical power meter to test whether the fiber is good or not. 2.Check whether the clock status is locked. 3. Replace the card.

name: CepRdi
disp: Remote Defect Indication of Circuit Emulation over Packet
reason: The opposite end received service affected alarm sent from the local end.
resolvent: 1. Check whether the opposite NE received LOPS or CEPAIS alarms 2. Replace the card

name: CepBadHdrStack
disp: the number of CEP header extensions detected in incoming packets does not match the expected number
reason: The packet is destroyed
resolvent: 1.Check whether the clock status is locked  2.Check the fiber power 3.Replace the card.

name: CepNeFailure

reason: The NE detect  LOPS
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber connection, and use an optical power meter to test whether the fiber is good or not. 2.Check whether the clock status is locked. 3. Replace the card.

name: CepFeFailure

reason: The opposite NE detect  LOPS
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber connection at the opposite NE, and use an optical power meter to test whether the fiber is good or not. 2.Check whether the clock status is locked. 3. Replace the card.

name: LOPS

resolvent: 1. Check the fiber connection, and use an optical power meter to test whether the fiber is good or not. 2.Check whether the clock status is locked. 3. Replace the card.

name: PktLossRateExc

reason: 1. The lost packet at the receiving end exceeds the threshold. The probable cause could be the fiber fault or the dirty fiber connector, etc. which cause optical power abnormal. 2. Theck clock is not loceked 3. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber connection, and use an optical power meter to test whether the fiber is good or not. 2.Check whether the clock status is locked. 3. Replace the card.

name: BufOver

resolvent: 1.Check whether the clock status is locked. 2. Replace the card.

name: RemotePktLoss

name: lpBbe_15m
disp: Threshold Crossing Alert: 15 min LP BBE threshold crossing
reason: 1. BIP2 error rate of the signal received in local NE crossed threshold.  2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check optical interface card to see if there is any bit error. 2. Check if the clock card is working properly. 3. Replace the card.

name: lpEs_15m
disp: Threshold Crossing Alert: 15 min LP ES threshold crossing
reason: 1. LP ES exceeds threshold.  2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check optical interface card to see if there is any bit error. 2. Check if the clock card is working properly. 3. Replace the card.

name: lpSes_15m
disp: Threshold Crossing Alert: 15 min LP SES threshold crossing
reason: 1. LP SES exceeds threshold. 2. Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the optical interface card to see if there is any bit error. 2. Check if the clock card is working properly. 3. Replace the card.

name: lpFebbe_15m
disp: Threshold Crossing Alert: 15 min LP FE BBE threshold crossing
reason: 1. Far-end BIP2 error rate of the signal received at the local NE crossed threshold. 2. Remote end card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check far-end optical interface card to see if there is any bit error. 2. Check if the far-end clock card is working properly. 3. Replace the card.

name: lpFees_15m
disp: Threshold Crossing Alert: 15 min LP FE ES threshold crossing
reason: 1. LP far-end ES exceeds threshold.  2. Far-end Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the far-end optical interface card to see if there is any bit error. 2. Check whether the far-end clock card is working properly. 3. Replace the far-end card.

name: lpFeses_15m
disp: Threshold Crossing Alert: 15 min LP FE SES threshold crossing
reason: 1. LP far-end SES exceeds threshold.  2. Far-end card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check far-end optical interface card to see if there is any bit error. 2. Check whether the far-end clock card is working properly. 3. Replace the far-end card.

name: lpCses_15m
disp: Threshold Crossing Alert: 15 min LP CSES threshold crossing

resolvent: 1. Check the optical interface card to see whether there is any bit error. 2. Check whether the clock card is working properly. 3. Replace the card.

name: lpFecses_15m
disp: Threshold Crossing Alert: 15 min LP FE CSES threshold crossing
reason: 1. LP far-end Consecutive SES exceeds threshold. 2. Far-end card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check far-end optical interface card to see whether there is any bit error. 2. Check whether the far-end clock card is working properly. 3. Replace the far-end card.

name: lpUas_15m
disp: Threshold Crossing Alert: 15 min LP UAS threshold crossing

name: lpNeUas_15m

name: EthernetSD
disp: SD is detected on Ethernet interface
reason: SD is occurred on the Ethernet interface
resolvent: 1. Check whether the fiber is correctly connected and use fiber power meter to check whether fiber is in good condition. 2. Check the transmission module of the peer-station.

name: SysMACCount_TCA
disp: Threshold Crossing Alert: SysMACCount threshold crossing
reason: Threshold Crossing Alert: SysMACCount threshold crossing
resolvent: Check if there's abnormal port in the FDB table..

name: VSIMACCount_TCA
disp: Threshold Crossing Alert: VSIMACCount threshold crossing
reason: Threshold Crossing Alert: VSIMACCount threshold crossing
resolvent: There're too many MAC addresses in the  FDB table.

name: LacpDown
disp: LACP Down
reason: LACP MUX state is out of  collecting_distributing
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber or cable connection. 2. Check the trunk configuration.

name: SysMACaddrAbnormal
disp: The system MAC address is abnormal.
reason: There's a fault in the card of OAM, OPCA, OPCB or OPCC.
resolvent: Reset or replace the card.

name: PortMACaddrAbnormal
disp: The MAC address in the specfic port is abnormal.
reason: The MAC address configured in the specific port is not allowed that may cause MAC address conflict.
resolvent: Configure the MAC address other than 00:00:00:00:00:00, 00:00:00:00:00:01 and ff:ff: ff:ff: ff:ff.

name: CardUnknown
disp: Can not get card type
reason: Card is online, but can not get the card type because of the IIC have something wrong.
resolvent: Power off then power on for this card

name: MeteringConfigFail
disp: The configuration to change metering mode is failed.
reason: The metering mode configuration is conflicted with the existing setting
resolvent: Remove current metering mode setting.

name: GeTimingCfgInvalid
disp: Timing configuration is invalid on GE electrical interface
reason: Timing configuration is invalid in the condition that the GE electrical interface is set to a timing source but GE PHY is up and operates in 1000M MASTER mode
resolvent: 1. Timing configuration on the GE interface is deleted. 2. GE interface is down. 3. GE PHY is up and  works in 1000M SLAVE mode.  4. GE PHY is up and operates in 100Mor 10Mbps.

name: ICCPConnFail
disp: ICCP connection failed
reason: The link or route between the PEs for ICCP is failed.
resolvent: 1.Check the link between the PEs for ICCP.2.Check the route between the PEs for ICCP.

name: SCLos
disp: Received system clock is loss of signal
reason: The received system clock signal is lost.
resolvent: 1. Check source of the system clock in clock module. 2. Replace the card.

name: SCBad
disp: Revceived system clock is bad
reason: The frequency offset of the received system clock is too big.
resolvent: 1. Check source of the system clock in clock module. 2. Replace the card.

name: EthrCfmLoc
disp: Loss of continuity (LOC) alarm
reason: Loss of continuity with peer MEP is detected.
resolvent: 1. Check the connection of cable. 2.Check the configuration.

name: EthrCfmMegIDMismatch
disp: MEG ID mismatch is detected.
reason: A MEP receives a CCM frame with correct MEG level but incorrect MEG ID.
resolvent: 1. Check the connection of cable. 2.Check the configuration.

name: EthrCfmMepIDMismatch
disp: Unexpected MEP ID is detected.
reason: A MEP receives a CCM frame with correct MEG level, correct MEG ID but with Unexpected MEP ID.
resolvent: 1. Check the connection of cable. 2.Check the configuration.

name: EthrCfmInterTimeMismatch
disp: Unexpected Period is detected.
reason: A MEP receives a CCM frame with correct MEG level, correct MEG ID, correct MEP ID, but with a period field value different than its own CCM transmission period.
resolvent: 1. Check the connection of cable. 2.Check the configuration.

name: EthrCfmLowLevel
disp: Unexpected MEG Level is detected.
reason: A MEP receives a CCM frame with low MEG level.
resolvent: 1. Check the connection of cable. 2.Check the configuration.

name: EthrCfmInvalidCCM
disp: Invalid CCM is detected.
reason: A MEP receives an invalid CCM frame at least one of the Remote MEP state machines is not receiving valid CCMs from its remote MEP.
resolvent: 1. Check the connection of cable. 2.Check the configuration.

name: EthrCfmRDI
disp: Ethernet CFM RDI alarm.
reason: The peer MEPs encounter a defect.
resolvent: Check whether the opposite end received any alarm indication and locate the fault.

name: EcsLos
disp: Clock source of external clock system is los
reason: The external clock at the corresponding port is lost.
resolvent: Check whether the fiber or the cable is connected properly or not.

name: Activesys_mismatch
disp: The card failed to start up from the active file system.
reason: There's some problem in the active file system for startup.
resolvent: 1. Reset the card. 2. Switch the current file system from active state to standby state.

name: slaveException
disp: The slave card check is failed.
reason:
The specific check item between the active and slave card is failed:

1.CheckID=0 Lsp Oam Ge0 Receive Package Count.

2.CheckID=1 Lsp Oam FPGA Receive Package Count.

3.CheckID=2 Lsp Oam FPGA Receive Package Absolute Count.

4.CheckID=3 Bcm Port Status.

5.CheckID=4 Bcm Receive Wrong Package Count.

6.CheckID=5 Bcm SendAndReceive Package Count.

7.CheckID=6 Cpld Master And Slave Register.

8.CheckID=7 Line Card Clock Status.

9.CheckID=8 Master And Slave Clock Working Status.

10.CheckID=9 Route Status.

11.CheckID=10 Sync Status.

12.CheckID=12 Oam FPGA Receive Wrong Package Count.
 
13.CheckID=13 Emulation FPGA Receive Wrong Package Count.
 
14.CheckID=14 Oam Ge0 Receive Wrong Package Count.
 
15.CheckID=15 The Heartbeat Check Stopped Unexpectedly (from the slave card to the master card).
resolvent:
1. Check if the service is impacted or there're other alarms existing. 
 2. If it is Yes in item 1, do the manual siwtch operation and check the slave card.
 3. If it is No in item 1, check the slave card.

name: SystemException
disp: The chip writing exception is occurred
reason: 1.CheckID=11 Switch Register Check.2.CheckID=16 CM48E16 Cfp Status Check
resolvent:
1. Check if the service is impacted or there're other alarms existing. 
 2. If it is Yes in item 1, do the manual siwtch operation and check the slave card.
 3. If it is No in item 1, check the slave card.

name: Lane0RxTooHigh

reason: 1. The power is too high, and the probable cause could be the fiber fault or the dirty fiber connector, etc. which cause optical power abnormal. 2.Card malfunctions.
resolvent: 1. Check the fiber connection, and use an optical power meter to test whether the fiber is good or not. 2. Replace the optical module. 3. Replace the card.

name: PoeFault
disp: Poe port status is fault
reason: Ports turns off due to over-load, short circuit or port thermal protection.
resolvent: Disconnect and then reconnect.

name: PoePowerExceed
disp: Alarm for power budget
reason: The total power is larger than the budget power
resolvent: Do not add any other device

name: FRRSwitch
disp: FRR switch to the protection
reason: working path failed
resolvent: Check the alarm appeared on the working path, try to fix the failure of the working path

name: VRRPSwitch
disp: VRRP switch to the protection
reason: working path failed
resolvent: Check the alarm appeared on the working path, try to fix the failure of the working path

name: UPCN
disp: uni port congestion notification
reason: uni port congestion,namely, there are yellow packtets being dropped,and the sum of it exceed the threshold.
resolvent: Check the QOS configuration of the port.

name: LossGNSSsignal
disp: The GNSS signal is loss or available satellite quantities is less than 4
reason: Available satellite quantity is less than 4.
resolvent: Check if antenna head is installed correctly, if feeder line connector is fixed or water seepage.

name: DegGNSS signal
disp: The available satellite quantities of GNSS signal is less than 6
reason: Available satellite quantity is less than 6.
resolvent: Check if antenna head is installed correctly, if feeder line connector is fixed or water seepage.

name: CLKPLLHold
disp: GM CLK PLL is in holdover status
reason: This alarm will occur when device startup. If it occur after device is locked, it means satellite is unavailable.
resolvent: Check if antenna head is installed correctly, if feeder line connector is fixed or water seepage.

name: CLKPLLFreerun
disp: GM CLK PLL is free run
reason: CLKPLLHold alarm will occur when device startup. If satellite is unavailable, the CLKPLLHold alarm will keep. After CLKPLLHold alarm kept 24 hours, CLKPLLFreerun alarm will occur.
resolvent: Check if antenna head is installed correctly, if feeder line connector is fixed or water seepage.

name: CLKPLLFastcap
disp: GM CLK PLL is fast capture
reason: When device startup, if capture available satellite, this alarm will occur.
resolvent: Normally the alarm will clear automatic soon. If the alarm is not clear, it may mean:  1. Hardware failure. 2. Device service overtime (10 years).

name: Sensor_Abnormal
disp: Temperature Sensor Failure
reason: Temperature sensor chip is damaged.
resolvent: Please replace the temperature sensor chip or replace the hardware board.

name: TimeUnlocked
disp: The time machine status shall be monitored, when it unlocked or abnormal, the alarm shall be reported.
reason: The time machine status is  unlocked or abnormal
resolvent: Check the signals and PTP messages received from PTP  slave port  and 1pps+tod port

name: TimeModulefailure
disp: The embedded clock chip, filter, and oscillator shall be monitored. When some component works abnormally , the alarm shall be reported.
reason: The embedded clock chip, filter, and oscillator works abnormally.
resolvent: Check the module status

name: TimeOutputFailure
disp: The time output module, including output interfaces, shall be monitored. When they  output messages or signals can't be sent,  the alarm shall be reported.
reason: The time output module, including output interfaces,  output messages is abonormal.
resolvent: Check the output status

name: LossAnnounce
disp: Announce message receipt shall be monitored for slave and passive port. When there is no one Announce message during portDS.announceReceiptTimeout, the alarm   shall be reported.
reason: There is no one Announce message received during portDS.announceReceiptTimeout.
resolvent: 1. For MC: Check  whether the configurations of announce interval and timeout of both local and peer time nodes are matched or not; 2.For UC: Check  whether the announce request  message is sent  from the slave or passive port or not, and is recieved by the peer master or not. 3. Check the lower transmission server level signals.

name: LossSync
disp: Sync message receipt shall be monitored for slave  and passive port. When there is no one Sync message during sync message interval, the alarm   shall be reported.
reason: There is no one Sync message received during sync message interval.
resolvent: 1. For MC: Check  whether the configurations of sync message interval of both local and peer time nodes are matched or not ; 2.For UC: Check  whether the sync request  message is sent from the slave port , and is recieved by the peer master or not . 3. Check the lower transmission server level signals.

name: LossDelay_Resp
disp: Delay-Response message receipt shall be monitored for slave port. When there is no one Delay-Response message during Delay-Response message interval, the alarm   shall be reported.
reason: There is no one Delay-Response message received during Delay-Response message interval.
resolvent: 1. Check  whether the delay request  message is sent from the slave port or not, and is recieved by the peer master or not . 2. Check the lower transmission server level signals.

name: TimesourceDegrade
disp: The Clockclass shall be checked for slave port. When receiving Clockclass is lower than  a configured threshold, and the stepsRemoved of the time reference source is 0, the alarm shall be reported.
reason: For salve port, receiving Clockclass is lower than  a configured threshold, and the stepsRemoved of the time reference source is 0.
resolvent: Check T-GM status and output clockclass value of this PTP domain.

name: 1PPSToDfailure
disp: 1PPS+ToD signal shall be monitored, when there is no 1pps or TOD signal, the alarm shall be reported.
reason: There is no 1pps or TOD signal, the alarm shall be reported.
resolvent: Check the cable or connector for 1pps+tod

name: 1PPSToDdegrade
disp: 1PPS+ToD signal shall be monitored, when 1pps or TOD signal amplitude is lower than a configured threshold,, the alarm shall be reported.
reason: The 1pps or TOD signal amplitude is lower than a configured threshold,, the alarm shall be reported.
resolvent: Check the cable or connector for 1pps+tod

name: DeviceOffLine
disp: Device OffLine
reason: 1. The device is not installed. 2. Cable between the device and the host machine is disconnected
resolvent: 1. Check the device. 2. Check the connection cables.

name: LspRxErrFfd
disp: Lsp received error FFD packets
reason: The threshold of received error FFD packets is crossed in any period of 3 consecutive seconds
resolvent: Check whether there are any defects occurred in the upstream section or node

name: OSPFNeighborDown
disp: OSPF neighbor is down
reason: 1.for P2P network:OSPF enable and OSPF neighbor state not FULL 2.for broadcast network:DR/BDR=OSPF enable and OSPF neighbor state!=FULL;DROTHER=OSPF disable=false and OSPF neighbor state=DOWN/INIT
resolvent: 1.check the link connection 2.check the OSPF configuration

name: DyingGasp
disp: Ungovernable local failure occurs
reason: Ungovernable local failure occurs.
resolvent: check the power supply.

name: CriticalEvent
disp: Unspecified critical event occurs.
reason: Unspecified critical event occurs.
resolvent: check the link and port.

name: RemoteLoopBackExpiry
disp: Remote loopback time out
reason: Remote loopback time out
resolvent: 1.check the link and port 2.check the configuration.

name: PacketLost
disp: PacketLost
reason: 1.check the link and port  2.check the card
resolvent: 1.check the link and port  2.check the card

name: LoopDetected
disp: Loop is detected on port
reason: There's loop network existed on specific UNI port
resolvent: Check if the topology involves loop on specific UNI port

name: Controller_Connection_Lost
disp: Connection Lost with Controller.
reason: 1. The device is not installed. 2. Cable between the device and the contrller is disconnected.
resolvent: 1. Check the device. 2. Check the connection cables.

name: VPNGroup_Connection_Lost
disp: Connection to VPNGroup is Lost.
reason: 1. VPNGroup is down. 2. VPNGroup IP address can not be reachable.
resolvent: 1. Check the VPNGroup running status.  2. Check network between VPNGroup and Kernel.

name: Controller_Send_Command_Failure
disp: Controller is failed to send command to NE.
reason: 1. NE is disconnected. 2. NE can not process the command.
resolvent: 1. Check the NE connection.  2. Some error in the command that NE can not process it.

name: EML_HistoryFM_Overload
disp: History EML Alarm Data OverLoad
reason: History EML alarm data reach the threshold value.
resolvent: Please remove part history EML alarm data .

name: NML_HistoryFM_Overload
disp: History NML Alarm Data OverLoad
reason: History NML alarm data reach the threshold value.
resolvent: Please remove part history NML alarm data .

name: System_Log_Data_Overload
disp: System Log Data OverLoad
reason: System Log data reach the threshold value.
resolvent: Please remove part System Log data .

name: Operator_Log_Data_Overload
disp: Operator Log Data OverLoad
reason: Operator Log data reach the threshold value.
resolvent: Please remove part Operator Log data .

name: Event_Log_Data_Overload
disp: Event Log Data OverLoad
reason: Event Log data reach the threshold value.
resolvent: Please remove part Event Log data .

name: Proxy_Connection_Lost
disp: Proxy Connection Lost
reason: 1. Proxy shut down. 2. Proxy lost connection with NMS.
resolvent: 1. Check Proxy running state. 2. Check the connection with NMS.

name: System_CPU_TCA
disp: System CPU utilization ratio cross the threshold.
reason: System CPU utilization ratio cross the threshold.
resolvent: Please check the system application .

name: System_Memory_TCA
disp: System memory utilization ratio cross the threshold.
reason: System memory utilization ratio cross the threshold.
resolvent: Please check the system application .

name: System_Disk_TCA
disp: System Disk capiability cross the threshold.
reason: System Disk capiability cross the threshold.
resolvent: Please check the system application .

name: Physical_Link_Failure
disp: Physical Link Failure
reason: One or more EML alarm(s) of the following type have occurred on one or both ends of the Physical link: 1.TransceiverOffline 2.TransceiverMismatch 3.TxOff 4.RxTooHigh 5.RxTooLow 6.LaserMismatch 7.LaserShutdown 8.CardOffline 9.CardMismatch 10.CardFailure
resolvent: Please check the related EML alarm to locate and fix the fault.

name: Signal_DL_Failure
disp: Digital Link Layer Failure
reason: One or more EML alarm(s) of the following type have occurred on one or both ends of the digital link: LOS ,LOF ,TF and MS,RS,AU,HP,PPP/GFP layer critical alarm or  Ehernet transmmission layer and port critical alam
resolvent: Please check the related EML alarm to locate and fix the fault.

name: Signal_DL_Degraded
disp: Digital Link Layer Degraded
reason: One or more EML alarm(s) of the following type have occurred on one or both ends of the digital link:  1.TD and some under critical serverity alarm of MS,RS,AU,HP; 2.PPP/GFP layer TCA alarm;3.Ehernet transmmission layer and port TCA alarm and PCN
resolvent: Please check the related EML alarm to locate and fix the fault.

name: TrafficOverThreshold
disp: Digital Link Traffic Over Threshold
reason: The real-time traffic has over the threshold
resolvent: Please reduce the traffic or add new equipments to expand the network.

name: LSP_PathDegraded
disp: LSP Path Degraded
reason: One or more EML alarm(s) of the following type have occurred on the end of the lsp: LSP layer alarm which conduce service degraded.
resolvent: 1.Please check the related EML alarm to locate and fix the fault 2. Reroute the LSP

name: LSP_PathFailure
disp: LSP Path Failure
reason: One or more EML alarm(s) of the following type have occurred on the end of the lsp: LSP layer alarm which is affected service critically.
resolvent: 1.Please check the related EML alarm to locate and fix the fault 2. Reroute the LSP

name: LSP_Config_Mismatch
disp: LSP Config Mismatch
reason: LSP configuration in NML layer differs from that in EML layer
resolvent: Please check LSP configuration in EML layer and that in NML layer.

name: PW_PathFailure
disp: PW Path Failure
reason: One or more EML alarm(s) of the following type have occurred on the end of the PW: PW  layer alarm which is affected service critically.
resolvent: Please check the related EML alarm to locate and fix the fault.

name: PW_PathDegraded
disp: PW Path Degraded
reason: One or more PW layer TCA EML alarm(s) of the following type have occurred on one or both ends of the PW End.
resolvent: Please check the related EML alarm to locate and fix the fault.

name: PW_Config_Mismatch
disp: PW Config Mismatch
reason: PW configuration in NML layer differs from that in EML layer
resolvent: Please check PW configuration in EML layer and that in NML layer.

name: TDM_CE_Failure
disp: TDM Service Customer Edge Failure
reason: 1.One or more EML alarm(s) of the following type have occurred on the end of the TDM Service Port: 1.Client Port Alarm which is affected service critically; 2.One or more EML alarm(s) of the following type have occurred on the end of the TDM service Channel: 1)SDH MS and RS layer 2)SDH AU and HO path layer 3)SDH VC3 level path layer 4)SDH TU and LO path layer
resolvent: Please check the related EML alarm to locate and fix the fault.

name: TDM_CE_Degraded
disp: TDM Service Customer Edge Degraded
reason: One or more EML alarm(s) of the following type have occurred on one or both ends of the TDM Service End: 1.Client Port layer TCA; 2.SDH MS and RS layer TCA;3.SDH AU and HO path layer TCA; 4.SDH VC3 level path layer TCA; 5.SDH TU and LO path layer TCA.
resolvent: Please check the related EML alarm to locate and fix the fault.

name: TDM_CE_Mismatch
disp: TDM Service Customer Edge Configuration Mismatch
reason: TDM service customer edge configuration in NML layer differs from that in EML layer
resolvent: Please check TDM service customer edge configuration in EML layer and that in NML layer.

name: ATM_CE_Failure

name: ATM_CE_Mismatch

resolvent: Please check ATM service customer edge configuration in EML layer and that in NML layer.
